show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

header.title: Modern Herbal Medicine with Steven Horne

title: Modern Herbal Medicine with Steven Horne
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com interviews Master Herbalist Steven Horne. Steven Horne is a professional… member and past president of the American Herbalists Guild (AHG) and a professional member of and certified instructor for the International Iridology Practitioner’s Association (IIPA).
  He is the author of numerous books and courses on herbs and natural healing, including his latest release, Modern Herbal Medicine (co-authored with Thomas Easley).
He is the president of The School of Modern Herbal Medicine, located in St.
George, UT.
Contact: Contact Information: The School of Modern Herbal Medicine http://ModernHerbalMedicine.com
